mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') AS month, SUM(quantity) AS units, SUM(quantity * price_cents) AS revenueCents FROM purchase_records WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} AND created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{months} MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month ASC
